Name: Wooden Donkey
Condition Immunities: blinded, charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
Senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10
Traits: Beast of Burden. The donkey is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity. Sure-Footed. The donkey has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
Actions: Hooves. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
